title: Father and son who died on Titan submersible described as 'best friends' at memorial
description: The father and son who were killed on the Titan submersible were "best friends" who "belonged together", their memorial service has heard.

title: 'Distant ancestor' to pizza shown in 2,000-year-old painting - but toppings are a little different
description: A 2,000-year-old painting uncovered in Pompeii could show a "distant ancestor" to the modern pizza, archaeologists have said.

title: Ukraine has recaptured territory held by Russia since 2014, UK says - as Zelenskyy visits frontline
description: Ukrainian forces have "highly likely" recaptured an area of territory occupied by Russia since 2014, the UK's Ministry of Defence has said.

title: AI tool finds sperm in infertile men faster and more accurately than doctors
description: A new artificial intelligence (AI) tool may be capable of identifying sperm in infertile men in just seconds, a study has suggested.

title: Belarus leader says 'no heroes' in failed Wagner mutiny - as Prigozhin in 'hotel with no windows'
description: Belarusian President Alexander Lukashenko has said the long-standing tensions between the Russian army and Wagner mercenary group, which staged a 24-hour mutiny at the weekend, had been mismanaged.

title: Putin thanks Russian army for stopping 'civil war'
description: Vladimir Putin has thanked the Russian army for stopping "a civil war" from breaking out after the Wagner Group's 24-hour mutiny at the weekend.

title: Military takes over prisons in crackdown on gangs after Honduras massacres
description: Inmates in Honduras were forced to sit half-naked in rows as soldiers searched for contraband in a sweep of the country's violent prisons by the military.

title: TikTok to let parents filter videos on teens' accounts - but there's a catch
description: TikTok has launched the ability for parents and guardians to filter out videos they don't want their children to see.

title: Decades of research 'destroyed' after cleaner turns off beeping lab freezer
description: A cleaner turned off a freezer at a university - leading to decades of research to be ruined, a million-dollar lawsuit has claimed.

title: Groom dies 10 minutes after getting married
description: A woman has been left widowed in Iowa just 10 minutes after her wedding, due to her husband dying from a fatal blood clot, according to local reports.

title: 'Laboratory of terror': Wagner Group responsible for torture, killings and massacres in Africa
description: The Wagner Group is responsible for a raft of war crimes and crimes against humanity in the Central African Republic (CAR), according to a new investigative report.
